result.title: A question about struct
result.content:
so lets say I have a struct named list :

struct list {
 string name;

};

and i want to have function f in it so it will be like : 

struct list {
 string name;
 void f(list a , etc){
  do something...
 }
};

so when I want to call function f I have to make two lists and be like this :

int main() {
 do something...
 list a , b;
 b.f(a , etc);
 do something...
}

But I want it to be like:

int main() {
 do something...
 list a;
 f(a , etc);
 do something...
}

How can I do that?
